hero.title: Facts Off
hero.subtitle: Discover fascinating historical facts and insights in just 10 minutes a day. Tailored to your interests, perfect for our fast-paced 2025 lifestyle.

quickEfficient.title: Quick & Efficient
quickEfficient.description: Get your daily dose of history in just 10 minutes

personalized.title: Personalized
personalized.description: Content tailored to your specific historical interests

richContent.title: Rich Content
richContent.description: Fascinating facts and insights from world history

features.title: Explore History Your Way
features.subtitle: Choose from 20+ specialized categories to personalize your daily historical journey. Each category is carefully curated to provide fascinating insights and facts.

ancientHistory.name: Ancient History
ancientHistory.description: From the dawn of civilization to the fall of Rome

medievalHistory.name: Medieval History
medievalHistory.description: Knights, castles, and the Middle Ages

socialHistory.name: Social History
socialHistory.description: Daily life, customs, and social structures

worldWars.name: World Wars
worldWars.description: The great conflicts of the 20th century

americanHistory.name: American History
americanHistory.description: The story of the United States

europeanHistory.name: European History
europeanHistory.description: The rich tapestry of European civilization

africanHistory.name: African History
africanHistory.description: The diverse history of the African continent

latinAmericanHistory.name: Latin American History
latinAmericanHistory.description: The vibrant history of Latin America

womenInHistory.name: Women in History
womenInHistory.description: Remarkable women who shaped the world

perfectForBusyLives.title: Perfect for Busy Lives
perfectForBusyLives.description: In our fast-paced 2025 world, finding time to learn can be challenging. Facts Off delivers bite-sized historical knowledge that fits perfectly into your daily routine.

cta.title: Start Your Historical Journey Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of learners who are discovering fascinating historical facts in just 10 minutes a day. Perfect for busy professionals, students, and history enthusiasts.

quickDailyDoses.title: Quick Daily Doses
quickDailyDoses.description: Get your historical knowledge fix in just 10 minutes - perfect for coffee breaks, commutes, or bedtime reading.

curatedContent.title: Curated Content
curatedContent.description: Expertly researched facts and insights from world-renowned historians and scholars.

personalizedExperience.title: Personalized Experience
personalizedExperience.description: Choose your interests and get content tailored specifically to what fascinates you most.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Daily Routine?
finalCta.description: Sign up now and get your first daily historical fact tomorrow morning. It's completely free to start your journey.

brand.name: Facts Off
brand.description: Your daily dose of historical knowledge. Discover fascinating facts and insights in just 10 minutes a day, tailored to your interests.
brand.tagline: Perfect for busy professionals, students, and history enthusiasts in our fast-paced 2025 world.

main.subtitle: Ready to discover fascinating historical facts tailored to your interests?

experienceLevels.intermediate: Intermediate - Some knowledge of historical events
experienceLevels.advanced: Advanced - Well-versed in many historical topics
experienceLevels.expert: Expert - Deep knowledge across multiple historical periods
